job_description:
Are you a Senior Software Product and Innovation Engineer for a new opportunity?Are you looking for a new contract opportunity?

We are pleased to offer you a new contract opportunity for you to consider: Senior Software Product and Innovation Engineer

Start: ASAP

Estimated length:12 months

Location: Nepean

Advantages

You will have an opportunity to work with a leading employer in the local market.

Responsibilities

Designing, developing and assessing technical solutions to address complex DSEF system issues

Analyzing and evaluate alternative technology solutions to meet DSEF system problems

Ensuring the integration of all aspects of DSEF system and solutions

Recommending options for resolving DSEF system and design issues

Updating and evolving the DSEF products System Breakdown Structures

Define and document interfaces within DSEF sub-systems, to external systems and between new and existing systems

Producing, documenting and managing system architectural designs and guidance, with contributions from across all engineering and support disciplines, to achieve comprehensive DSEF system implementation

Qualifications

Performing any other related work as required.

Bachelor’s degree in software, computer, systems, electrical, or a suitable engineering or technical field required to support Land C4ISR.

Minimum of 15 years of demonstrated experience as Software Architect, having experience with the majority of the following:

Lead the technical vision for software products and capabilities.

Develop technical architectures, frameworks and strategies to meet software or system requirements.

Analyze, design and implement software produced systems and architectures.

Design, develop and assess technical solutions to address complex product issues.

Data architecture development, definition, framework and implementation for software products & information systems.

Software Integration: hardware and software, (COTS and/or custom developed) components into new or existing systems.

Recommend options for resolving software or product system and design issues.

Demonstrated experience in the field of Firepower, ISR, C4ISR, or Modelling and Simulation application development.

Software life-cycle management.

Minimum of 10 years of demonstrated experience as a Software Architect on Military Command and Control Software Information Products.

Minimum of 8 years of demonstrated experience in the preparation of technical concept documents, system specifications, and technical proposals in the field of Information Technology / Information management or engineering.

Nice to Haves:

Project Management Professional (PMP) Certification

Summary

Do you have this experience? If you answer YES, then please apply IMMEDIATELY to so we can then discuss your experience and interest in this opportunity!
